title: I have a patent, but I don't have the budget to commercialize it, so I want to sell the patent. What are some ways to sell patents? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here are some difficult truths… You don’t sell patents. You license them. Find a company that makes something similar and offer it to them. You will likely be disappointed at their offer… I suggest that you take it anyway. Just because you have a patent doesn’t mean it is commercially viable. If you don’t have the budget to bring the patent to life then you probably don’t have the budget to defend it in court and the patent means very little. The government will not do it for you.

To have your patent or patents considered by IPOfferings for sale, licensing or other monetization by us, send an e-mail to info@IPOfferings.com and include the following information: A list of the patents by patent number and title. A summary of the technology covered by the patent(s)
